description:
#1 Mom`s Assistant, Ai, has coincidentally met a cool-looking man and fallen in love straight away. Not only that, she has met him twice and thought that it was a fateful encounter...  #2 One day, Dad wakes up at home with just his pants on. He has a huge bump on his forehead. It looks like the night before he had too much to drink. But he doesn`t remember what happened at all. When he tries to recall his faint memory... #3 At a friendship party, Bunji and his friends didn`t bother to peel carrots as usual, put the whole lot of potatoes in, and their moms start to get worried. While glancing the other way, a girl in the same class gets scolded for...  #4 On the road right in front of Mom`s house, there is a child that is wiggling like a caterpillar. He is Fumi`s classmate, when he plays the game rock-paper-scissors, he only uses scissors… In short, he’s “Scissors Jo.” The next day, he walks down the road with cardboard around him to be a cardboard robot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cupid`s Arrow / Who...? / Hot! / Genius on the Road
キューピッドの矢 / だれ...? / からいっ! / 路上の天才
